entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Fog at times overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Thursday 27 April 2023
